member.name: D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Temperature and Tint effect.

member.name: D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP.D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP_TEMPERATURE
member.summary: The D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP_TEMPERATURE property is a float value specifying how much to increase or decrease the temperature of the input image. The allowed range is -1.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.0.

member.name: D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP.D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP_TINT
member.summary: The D2D1_TEMPERATUREANDTINT_PROP_TINT property is a float value specifying how much to increase or decrease the tint of the input image. The allowed range is -1.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.0.
